item.description:
Small stakes friendly home game...byob...typically $20 per game tournament style...Beginners welcome. Will play 1-3 games depending on length of games. We have poker table, cards and chips...Just bring yourself and a beverage of choice.

As always...our games are for entertainment purposes only.
item.how_to_find_us: Apartment in in back of Red Building - Cummings on Mailbox - call Mike 401-559-3846
item.name: No Limit Texas Hold Em
